alert.note: Alert for Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 8:38PM EST until February 05 at 9:50AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Conasauga River near Eton affecting Whitfield and Murray Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Conasauga River near Eton. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Minor flooding of woodlands, pasture and fields begins along the river, upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 286 or Dawnville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 10.5 feet Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
